General.Name: Cathedral Energy Services Ltd
General.Description: Cathedral Energy Services Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, offers directional drilling services to oil and natural gas companies in western Canada and the United States. It provides horizontal and directional drilling services, measurement-while-drilling systems, positive displacement mud motors, rotary steerable systems, drilling jars, shock subs, drill collars, and drilling optimization and well planning services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Calgary, Canada.
General.Address: 6030 - 3rd Street SE, Calgary, AB, Canada, T2H 1K2
